title: (x) Desktop screens - Univers Ultra Cond {Metadox}
content: If anyone could identify this it would be really appreciated. ![font](http://web.archive.org/web/20051111124626im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/48299.jpg)
author: remixed05

comments.content:
Hard to tell at such a small size, but [Univers Ultra Condensed](http://web.archive.org/web/20051111124626/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/univers/59-ultra-condensed/testdrive.html?s=DESKTOP+SCREENS&p=48) is close. You could also try out [Block Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20051111124626/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/redrooster/block-gothic-rr/light-extra-condensed/testdrive.html?s=DESKTOP+SCREENS.&p=72) from Red Rooster.   
   
[edit: oops, didn't realize Magnus had already IDed this in another thread. But we came up with the same thing, so that's good.]
